revised_title: Observations on the Life Cycle and Habits of Vespae Ichneumones
tldr: The author, Francis Willoughby, studies the breeding habits and life cycle of Vespae Ichneumones, a type of wasp, and their unique method of laying eggs inside caterpillars. He also observes the behavior of these wasps, including their interactions with caterpillars, and their methods of creating nests and caring for their young.
